import React from 'react' import "./Header.css" import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import SearchIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Search'; import ShoppingBasketIcon from '@material-ui/icons/ShoppingBasket'; import { useStateValue } from "./StateProvider"; function Header() { const [{ basket, user }] = useStateValue(); const login = () => { user.signOut(); } console.log(basket); return (
Hello {user?.email} {user ? "Sign Out" : "Sign In"}
Returns & Orders
Your Prime
{basket.length}
) } export default Header
